title: Sudden Fps Drop
body: Installed the new update for the client today. Played 5-6 aram games but the next game I got into the next one after leaving for a couple minutes to eat.  returned went into my next aram game and have 5 fps compared to my usual 190. I restart my computer and It didn't solve the issue solutions?

replies.body:
Wow, that's really weird! Since this happened so suddenly, it's likely this is caused by a malfunctioning display driver or perhaps a windows power setting was randomly changed. I'd like you to work through our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions for this and will help you ensure the factors I brought up have been addressed.

Let me know if you continue to experience low FPS after working through those steps.
I've had the same problem but the FPS guide didn't do anything to help my fps.

Since you noticed no change as a result of those steps, we'll need to take a look at your system logs to determine what else could be problematic here. I'd recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs file to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get back to you.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.

i have the same problem too its sooooo annoying pls fix it my fps was around 60-70 but now its just around 1-10 :| 
its rly annpying pls fix this. 
thx
